title: Archer CMS
summary: Fullstack CMS built with React 19, Vite, Express, and SQLite. Passport.js for auth.

title: Beginner JavaScript Demos
summary: Small demos using JavaScript libraries and technology. Started as a code area for demos I created.

title: Slim 3 YAML Search Web Service
summary: A web service built using Slim 3 and the 'mnapoli/front-yaml' composer library to search in YAML tags in a folder _post.

title: Github Gists
summary: Helpful gists to get started with development. Includes: NPM Build Scripts, Jekyll Config files, and more.

title: Pokemon Team Builder
summary: A modular Gen 1 Pokémon team builder built with vanilla JavaScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.
